long_description: Designed to fit a wide range of bicycles from mountain bikes to kids' bikes, the Saris Freedom 2 bike hitch rack uses an easy-to-reach low tray height to haul 2 bikes of any size without fuss. Low tray height makes it easy to put bikes onto rack, and 21 lb. weight makes it easy to install yourself. Upright holders on arm adjust quickly to fit a variety of bike types and sizes. Adjustable cradles and ratcheting anti-sway straps secure and stabilize bikes during transport. Folds down when not in use, giving easy access to door or hatch. The Saris Freedom 2 bike hitch rack fits both 1.25 in. and 2 in. hitch receivers.
short_description: Designed to fit a wide range of bicycles from mountain bikes to kids' bikes, the Saris Freedom 2 bike hitch rack uses an easy-to-reach low tray height to haul 2 bikes of any size without fuss.
